events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return the item because it doesn’t meet my expectations. Please advise on how to get a refund.
The customer has requested a refund for a recent purchase. Categorizing the issue under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah T. for further assistance.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your item and get a refund. I’m here to help you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. I want to return the item because the color was different than what was shown in the photos online.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund as soon as we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I look forward to receiving the shipping label and completing the return.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please send back the item within 10 days to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to see if you have shipped the item back. Let us know if you need any further assistance with your refund.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed your refund. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
